CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 10, 1969, pg. 10 reads: "Mothers Work: Babies Win - The fourth annual Baby Contest was sponsored by the combined missionary societies of John Wesley AME Zion Church, recently, and the top three winners look a bit amazed at the results, because, in fact, their mothers did the running. Mrs. Thelma Lovette, left, is making the presentations.  Winners and their main supporters are, seated, left to right, Mrs. Vashti Moreland and Baby Monique; Mrs. Larue Davis and Baby Stephanie Marie and Mrs. Francine Myers and Baby Casandra.  Sponsors in picture are, Mrs. Sarah McCaskill, standing second from left, president of the senior missionary Society; and Mrs. Lena Davis, second from right. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Rev. V.R. Hill and Vashti Moreland with daughter Monique, first prize winner in baby contest, in John Wesley AME Zion Church
